community.title: FREE2RP Community Rules
community.note: These rules apply across all platforms, including Discord and in-game.

items.title: No Hate Speech or Bigotry
points: This is an RP community—real-world prejudice has no place here.
Prohibited: Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, religious intolerance, or any hate speech (in or out of character).
Roleplay is not an excuse for hate. Violators will be removed immediately.

items.title: No Harassment
points: Includes: Targeted insults, sexual harassment, threats, stalking, or unwanted contact after boundaries are set.
Examples of unacceptable behavior:
• Spamming messages after being blocked.
• Harassing players over RP via Discord/social media.
• Creating group chats to mock, harass, or doxx others.
• Sharing personal info/screenshots without consent.
Report harassment via ticket with evidence.

items.title: Off-Server Behavior
points: We won’t mediate personal drama, but hostile actions (doxxing, threats, etc.) may result in removal.

items.title: No Toxicity
points: Allowed: Constructive criticism.
Prohibited: Abuse, harassment, or targeted negativity toward players, staff, or the server.

items.title: Adult-Oriented Server
points: 18+ only. Humor and discussions may include mature themes.

items.title: Ban Appeals
points: Submit appeals at free2rp.com or Discord.gg/FREE2RP.
Appeals are reviewed independently for fairness.

items.title: No Backseat Moderating
points: Report rule breaks via tickets—do not enforce rules publicly.

items.title: Ban Evasion & Alt Accounts
points: Prohibited: Using alts to evade bans, spy, or manipulate interactions.
All alternate accounts must be disclosed to staff.

items.title: Ticket & Channel Use
points: Keep reports clear and respectful.
No spam, memes, or joke reports. Misuse may result in restrictions.

items.title: Naming Policy
points: Usernames (Discord/in-game) must be appropriate.
No slurs, offensive content, or impersonation.
Staff may request changes—refusal may result in removal.

items.title: No Advertising
points: Do not promote other servers/Discords without staff approval.

items.title: Leave Drama at the Door
points: Bring positivity, fun, and creativity—not grudges.

items.title: Outages and Crashes
points: No compensation for losses due to crashes, network outages, or unscheduled restarts.

items.title: Script Bugs
points: Compensation is possible for bugs within our scripts if evidence of loss is provided.

server.title: FREE2RP FiveM Server Rules
server.tagline: Roleplay-first, immersive, and fair play for all.

items.title: Roleplay First
points: Stay in-character and engage in every scene.
If someone offers RP, reciprocate at all times.

items.title: No Breaking Character
points: Do not complain about mechanics mid-scene.
Report serious issues (hate speech, harassment) immediately.

items.title: No Metagaming
points: Do not use OOC info (streams, Discord, etc.) in-character.

items.title: No Stream Sniping
points: Watching streams to gain an advantage is prohibited.

items.title: No Powergaming
points: Do not force RP outcomes without giving others a chance to react.

items.title: Fail RP
points: Maintain high RP quality.
Avoid disruptive outfits/behaviour that break immersion.

items.title: General Conflict
points: No Random Deathmatching (RDM): Initiate with verbal RP before attacking.
No Vehicle Deathmatching: Don’t use vehicles as weapons unless escaping.
No Camping Teleports/Ladders: Avoid ambushing players in no-counterplay areas.

items.title: Conflict Numbers
points: Turf/Property Defense: Only defend with those present—no reinforcements mid-fight.
Heists & Crime RP: Max 5 criminals vs. 8 police.
No Endless Conflict: Repeated attacks require RP resolution.

items.title: Post-Conflict Behavior
points: Stay in character when downed. No OOC trash talk.
New Life Rule (NLR): If executed, remember only vague details—not names/identifiers.

items.title: Pocket Wiping
points: Do not loot everything without an RP reason.

items.title: No Exploiting
points: Report bugs/glitches—never abuse them.
Prohibited: Combat logging, money duping, respawn abuse.

items.title: Value Your Life (VYL)
points: Surrender if outgunned or face consequences appropriate to the scene.

items.title: Crime & Server Restarts
points: No criminal activity within 30 minutes before or after a server restart.

items.title: In-Game Harassment
points: RP conflict is fine; personal targeting is not.
Harassment includes:
• Forcing yourself into someone’s RP repeatedly.
• Using multiple characters to provoke the same player.
• Ignoring clear attempts to exit RP.

items.title: Not Harassment
points: Gang retaliation from actual storylines.
Long-term rivalries with engaged RP.

items.title: Graphic Content
points: No Erotic RP.
Avoid real-life trauma topics (school shootings, suicide, etc.).

items.title: Ocean Dumping
points: Allowed for story purposes, but never force permadeath or memory loss.

items.title: Government/Job Rules
points: Corruption RP must be realistic.
Do not abuse job perks for OOC reasons.

items.title: No Copyright Music
points: Protect content creators—avoid copyrighted music in public.
